assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create UX/UI strategy for SSELFIE Studio landing page focusing on:
1. Hero section layout and messaging
2. Feature showcase structure
3. Pricing section design
4. Call-to-action placement
5. User flow optimization
Include wireframe recommendations and conversion optimization elements.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Developing main landing page for SSELFIE Studio launch. Need to effectively communicate all-in-one personal branding platform value proposition and drive conversions for both Creator (€27/month) and Entrepreneur (€67/month) tiers.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Develop visual branding strategy for SSELFIE Studio landing page including:
1. Color palette recommendations
2. Typography selection
3. Key visual elements and imagery style
4. Brand consistency guidelines
5. Visual hierarchy for content sections
Focus on professional, modern aesthetic that appeals to both creators and entrepreneurs.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Creating cohesive visual identity for SSELFIE Studio landing page that reflects premium all-in-one personal branding platform positioning.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create comprehensive copywriting strategy for SSELFIE Studio landing page including:
1. Value proposition and main headline options
2. Feature benefit statements
3. Pricing tier messaging
4. Call-to-action copy variations
5. SEO-optimized content structure
Focus on compelling messaging that highlights the platform's all-in-one value proposition and cost savings compared to multiple subscriptions.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Developing persuasive copy for SSELFIE Studio landing page that emphasizes the platform's unique value in replacing multiple expensive subscriptions (€120-180+/month) with one affordable solution (€27/month Creator, €67/month Entrepreneur plans).

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling landing page copy for SSELFIE Studio focusing on:

1. Main headline that captures the all-in-one personal branding platform value
2. Sub-headlines for each key feature (TRAIN, STYLE, SHOOT, BUILD, MANAGE)
3. Value propositions highlighting:
   - Cost savings vs €120-180 monthly subscriptions
   - Time savings from integrated workflow
   - Professional results for creators
4. Clear pricing tier benefits for:
   - Creator tier (€27/month)
   - Entrepreneur tier (€67/month)
5. Call-to-action copy that drives sign-ups

Key messaging points to incorporate:
- Replace multiple expensive subscriptions with one solution
- AI-powered personal branding made simple
- Professional results without the professional price tag
- From photoshoot to website - everything in one place
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Developing main landing page copy to drive SSELFIE Studio launch. Copy needs to clearly communicate the platform's value proposition and drive conversions. This is a critical component of our launch strategy.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Audit current website building capabilities and provide status report on:

1. Which website building features are fully implemented
2. Current limitations or restrictions
3. Key differentiators from competitors
4. Technical capabilities we can highlight in marketing
5. Recommended feature emphasis for launch messaging
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Developing landing page strategy and need to ensure our messaging aligns with actual technical capabilities. This will inform our copywriting and value proposition statements.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling headlines and value proposition copy for SSELFIE Studio's landing page. Focus on:
1. Main headline that captures the all-in-one personal branding platform value
2. Sub-headlines highlighting key benefits and TRAIN→STYLE→SHOOT→BUILD→MANAGE journey
3. Value proposition statements that emphasize replacing multiple €120-180+ subscriptions with one solution
4. Clear differentiation between Creator (€27/mo) and Entrepreneur (€67/mo) tiers
5. Pain points addressed (time savings, cost savings, simplified workflow)
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're preparing for immediate market launch of SSELFIE Studio. The copy needs to clearly communicate our value as an all-in-one personal branding platform while highlighting the cost savings compared to using multiple tools. This is critical for initial user acquisition and positioning.
expectedDeliverables: Sub-headlines for each key feature/journey step

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create high-converting headlines and value propositions for SSELFIE Studio's landing page that:
1. Emphasize the all-in-one personal branding solution (replacing €120-180+ worth of monthly subscriptions)
2. Highlight the 5-step journey: TRAIN → STYLE → SHOOT → BUILD → MANAGE
3. Focus on creator pain points around managing multiple expensive tools
4. Include primary headline options, subheadlines, and 3-5 core value propositions
5. Incorporate pricing value messaging (€27 Creator / €67 Entrepreneur tiers)
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're preparing for SSELFIE Studio's market launch, focusing on positioning as an integrated personal branding platform. The copy needs to clearly communicate the value proposition and differentiate from individual point solutions like Canva, ChatGPT, etc.
expectedDeliverables: Subheadline options that support main value proposition
3-5 core value propositions written in compelling language
Price comparison messaging highlighting savings vs. multiple subscriptions

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create visual style recommendations for SSELFIE Studio's landing page that will:
1. Support and enhance the upcoming copy from Victoria
2. Visualize the 5-step journey (TRAIN → STYLE → SHOOT → BUILD → MANAGE)
3. Create compelling visual hierarchy for pricing tiers
4. Design mockups for key value proposition sections
5. Ensure brand consistency across all elements
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Working in parallel with Victoria who is developing the copy. We need a cohesive visual language that emphasizes SSELFIE Studio as a premium, all-in-one personal branding platform while maintaining accessibility and appeal to creators.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Create visual brand style guide for Sandra's personal brand that aligns with SSELFIE STUDIO aesthetic. Focus on colors, typography, and visual elements that tell the "single mom to tech founder" story.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Building foundational brand assets for Sandra's personal brand scaling strategy

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Develop high-converting landing page template for Sandra's personal brand that highlights her journey from single mom to tech founder, with focus on SSELFIE STUDIO as her flagship product.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Creating conversion-focused web presence for Sandra's brand scaling

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create a cohesive social media branding strategy for SSELFIE Studio launch, focusing on:
1. Visual identity guidelines for social media
2. Content pillars that highlight the 5-step journey (TRAIN→STYLE→SHOOT→BUILD→MANAGE)
3. Brand voice and messaging that emphasizes the all-in-one solution replacing multiple subscriptions
4. Strategic positioning against €120-180 competitor costs
assignedTasks.workflowContext: This is part of the SSELFIE Studio launch strategy, targeting existing followers and new potential customers. We need to position SSELFIE Studio as the comprehensive personal branding solution at an attractive price point.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Develop a community growth and engagement strategy for SSELFIE Studio:
1. Plan for converting Sandra's existing 135K+ followers into platform users
2. Community engagement tactics for both Creator (€27/mo) and Entrepreneur (€67/mo) tiers
3. Social proof and testimonial collection system
4. Community-driven content creation framework
5. Engagement metrics and KPIs
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're launching SSELFIE Studio and need to leverage Sandra's existing audience while building a strong community around the platform. Focus on creating value and engagement that drives platform adoption.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling sales page copywriting including:
1. Main headline and sub-headlines that highlight SSELFIE Studio as the all-in-one personal branding platform
2. Clear value propositions emphasizing how we replace €120-180+ monthly subscriptions (Canva, ChatGPT, photo editors) with one affordable solution
3. Benefit-focused copy for both pricing tiers:
   - Creator (€27/month)
   - Entrepreneur (€67/month)
4. Compelling descriptions of our 5-step journey:
   - TRAIN (AI model)
   - STYLE (personalized branding)
   - SHOOT (photo prompts)
   - BUILD (website creation)
   - MANAGE (ongoing content)
5. Call-to-action copy that drives conversions

Focus on pain points: high costs of multiple subscriptions, time waste switching between tools, complexity of personal branding.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We need conversion-focused sales copy that positions SSELFIE Studio as the comprehensive yet affordable solution for personal branding. The copy should emphasize our unique value proposition of replacing expensive tool subscriptions with one platform. This is for immediate launch marketing materials.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling headlines and value propositions for SSELFIE Studio's sales page focusing on:

1. Main headline that captures the all-in-one personal branding platform value
2. Sub-headlines highlighting key benefits of replacing multiple subscriptions (Canva, ChatGPT, photo editors) with one solution
3. Value propositions for both pricing tiers:
   - Creator (€27/month)
   - Entrepreneur (€67/month)
4. Clear benefit statements around the TRAIN → STYLE → SHOOT → BUILD → MANAGE journey

Key messaging points to incorporate:
- Cost savings vs €120-180+ monthly subscriptions
- All-in-one platform simplification
- Personal branding acceleration
- AI-powered transformation
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're preparing for SSELFIE Studio's market launch and need compelling sales copy that clearly communicates our value proposition and pricing tiers. This copy will be central to our sales page and conversion strategy.
expectedDeliverables: Benefit statements for each step of the user journey

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling homepage headlines for SSELFIE Studio that:
1. Emphasize the all-in-one personal branding platform value proposition
2. Highlight the cost-saving benefit (replacing €120-180+ monthly subscriptions)
3. Incorporate the TRAIN → STYLE → SHOOT → BUILD → MANAGE journey
4. Appeal to creators and entrepreneurs
5. Focus on immediate value delivery for launch

Key points to incorporate:
- Primary value: All-in-one personal branding solution
- Cost benefit: Replace multiple expensive subscriptions
- Target audience: Creators (€27/mo) and Entrepreneurs (€67/mo)
- Unique selling point: Complete personal branding journey with AI assistance
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're preparing for the immediate launch of SSELFIE Studio. These headlines will be crucial for the homepage to clearly communicate our value proposition and convert visitors. The copy needs to be launch-ready and focused on what we can deliver now.

Prepare the homepage structure to receive new headlines:

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Rewrite all pre-login page copy focusing on personal branding transformation. Use Sandra's story as the core narrative. Emphasize the power of having your own AI model trained on your unique brand.

Focus on communicating the value of the website building capabilities within SSELFIE Studio.

Pay special attention to critical paths and potential friction points.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Design and implement an automated task execution workflow that:
1. Periodically checks for assigned tasks across all agents
2. Automatically triggers agent activation when tasks are assigned
3. Implements task prioritization based on urgency/dependencies
4. Sets up automated handoffs between agents
5. Creates a monitoring system for task progress
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We need to improve the efficiency of our multi-agent system by ensuring tasks are automatically picked up and executed. This will streamline our operations for Sandra's SSELFIE STUDIO launch.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Implement the technical backend for automated task execution:
1. Create an API endpoint for task status monitoring
2. Implement a task queue system with priority handling
3. Set up automated agent activation triggers
4. Create a task dependency resolution system
5. Implement real-time task status updates
assignedTasks.workflowContext: This is part of our automated task execution system implementation. The backend needs to support Wilma's workflow automation and enable seamless agent activation.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Set up monitoring and organization system for automated tasks:
1. Create a structured task repository
2. Implement logging and monitoring
3. Set up task execution metrics
4. Create agent performance dashboards
5. Implement automatic task archiving
assignedTasks.workflowContext: This complements the automated task execution system by providing visibility and organization to all automated processes.

7. Auth error handling UI

assignedTasks.workflowContext: These are the real pages users see and interact with. All copy and content should support this specific user journey.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: URGENT: Conduct thorough QA testing on actual user navigation flow: editorial-landing.tsx (/) → Studio (/workspace) → Train (/ai-training) → Photoshoot (/maya) → Gallery (/gallery) → Flatlays (/flatlay-library) → Profile (/profile). Test all user paths and interactions within these core pages.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: These are the primary pages that need thorough testing. Focus on real user journeys through these specific routes.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Urgent: Implement new editorial style guide across all frontend pages. Key requirements:
- Update typography: Times New Roman for headlines, -apple-system for body
- Implement clamp() responsive typography
- Apply color scheme: #0a0a0a, #ffffff, #f5f5f5
- Set section padding to 120px and max-width to 1400px
- Add uppercase transforms and wide letter-spacing for headlines
Reference editorial-style-guide.json for complete specs.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Critical style guide update for SSELFIE Studio platform launch. This needs immediate implementation to maintain brand consistency.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Update all UI components to match new editorial style guide:
- Audit existing components against editorial-style-guide.json
- Update component library with new typography, colors, and spacing
- Ensure all components use clamp() for responsive sizing
- Verify uppercase text transforms and letter-spacing in appropriate components
Focus on maintaining consistency across the design system.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Major style guide update requiring immediate component library alignment for SSELFIE Studio launch.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Perform comprehensive QA testing of new style guide implementation:
- Verify typography rendering across all browsers
- Test responsive behavior of clamp() functions
- Check color consistency across all pages
- Validate section padding and max-width implementation
- Test uppercase transforms and letter-spacing
Document any inconsistencies or rendering issues.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Critical style guide update requires immediate QA validation across all platform elements.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Update and organize style guide documentation:
- Ensure editorial-style-guide.json is properly versioned
- Update README files with new style guidelines
- Create documentation for developers on style implementation
- Organize example snippets and usage guidelines
Maintain clear documentation of all style decisions.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: New editorial style guide requires comprehensive documentation for team reference.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Provide status update on editorial style guide implementation. If not started, prepare implementation plan. If in progress, share current status and timeline.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Checking completion status of all major tasks including editorial style guide implementation. Need verification of current state and next steps.
expectedDeliverables: Current status of style guide implementation

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Address critical React version mismatch: Update react-is to ^18.2.0, verify Vite configuration, and test forwardRef functionality.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: High-priority technical task to resolve React dependency issues affecting production functionality.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Urgent: Update react-is dependency to ^18.2.0 in frontend package.json. Check and update Vite configuration for React 18 compatibility. Test forwardRef functionality after updates. This is blocking development.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Critical React version mismatch needs immediate resolution for frontend stability. This affects the entire SSELFIE Studio platform frontend.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Technical review needed: Verify React 18 compatibility across all backend integrations. Check for any API endpoints or server-side rendering that might be affected by React 18 upgrade. Ensure all backend services are compatible with the frontend React version update.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Frontend React version update to 18 requires backend compatibility verification to prevent any integration issues.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: QA Testing Required: After React 18 updates are implemented, conduct thorough testing of forwardRef functionality and overall React component behavior. Focus on components using refs and ensure no regressions.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Major React version update requires comprehensive QA testing to ensure platform stability.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
URGENT: Investigate and fix database connectivity issues affecting task management system. Priority tasks:
1. Debug database connection failures
2. Implement database health monitoring
3. Recover any lost task data
4. Set up automatic task state reconciliation
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Critical system health investigation revealing database connectivity issues blocking task management functionality

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
CRITICAL: Resolve React version mismatch affecting production:
1. Update react-is to ^18.2.0
2. Verify Vite configuration
3. Test forwardRef functionality
4. Implement version consistency checks
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Production blocking issue with React versioning causing component failures

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
URGENT: Audit and reconcile task management system:
1. Review all workflow persistence files
2. Clean up phantom task entries
3. Implement task state validation
4. Document task management architecture
assignedTasks.workflowContext: System showing 99 phantom in_progress tasks that need reconciliation

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
URGENT: React version mismatch needs immediate resolution:
1. Update react-is to ^18.2.0
2. Verify and update Vite configuration
3. Test forwardRef functionality
4. Implement version consistency checks

Required Actions:
- Locate and update package.json with correct React dependencies
- Review and update Vite configuration
- Test component forwarding
- Add version validation
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Critical production issue affecting React version compatibility. Need immediate technical resolution to ensure consistent React versioning across the application.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
URGENT: QA Testing needed for React version update:
1. Verify React 18.2.0 compatibility across all components
2. Test forwardRef functionality thoroughly
3. Run regression tests after version update
4. Document any breaking changes
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Supporting Victoria in critical React version mismatch resolution. Need comprehensive testing to ensure update doesn't break existing functionality.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Review and verify the current implementation of the editorial style guide across content assets. Focus on tone consistency, brand voice alignment, and documentation completeness.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Editorial style guide implementation verification following system task cleanup. Need comprehensive audit of current state.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Audit social media content against the editorial style guide. Verify consistency across platforms and identify any posts needing updates to meet guidelines.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Comprehensive editorial style guide verification across all social channels following system update.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Create automated workflow to clean up stale tasks (>24h old) that are neither completed nor failed. Include safety checks and logging.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Task management system maintenance and optimization

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Implement additional validation rules for task state transitions. Ensure atomic updates and prevent race conditions.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Enhancing task management system reliability

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Urgent: Fix admin user sselfie gallery issues:
1. Images cannot be deleted
2. Investigate why generated images are not appearing in admin gallery
3. Check S3 bucket configuration and ensure all images are properly stored
4. Remove unauthorized stock photos added by Replit agent
5. Implement proper image management functionality
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Sandra reported issues with her admin sselfie gallery functionality. This is blocking proper image management and needs immediate attention for launch readiness.
expectedDeliverables: Implementation of proper image storage in S3
Working admin gallery with all generated images

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Urgent: Fix critical image gallery functionality issues:
1. Implement image deletion endpoint and functionality
2. Debug why generated images are not being saved to generated_images table
3. Audit S3 bucket configuration and permissions
4. Add proper error handling for image operations
5. Create cleanup script for unauthorized stock photos

Current findings:
- Empty generated_images table
- S3 bucket: sselfie-training-zips.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com
- Images stored but not properly managed in admin gallery
assignedTasks.workflowContext: This is blocking admin functionality for SSELFIE Studio launch. Need immediate resolution of image management system.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Urgent: Repository cleanup and organization for image gallery:
1. Audit all image-related files and directories
2. Identify and list unauthorized stock photos
3. Create organized structure for image management
4. Document current image storage patterns
5. Prepare cleanup recommendations
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Supporting critical image gallery functionality fixes for SSELFIE Studio launch

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Prepare test plan for image gallery functionality:
1. Design test cases for image deletion
2. Create validation steps for image generation flow
3. Plan S3 storage verification tests
4. Develop user permission testing scenarios
5. Document expected behaviors and edge cases
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Supporting critical image gallery fixes - will need thorough testing once implemented

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Investigate and implement image restoration process for Sandra's admin account. Need to:
1. Verify AWS S3 bucket access and permissions
2. Check local storage implementation
3. Ensure proper migration between local and S3 storage
4. Implement recovery process for any lost gallery images
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Sandra needs her admin user images restored to her SSELFIE gallery. We've identified S3 storage but need technical verification of the full image storage system.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
URGENT: Implement AWS S3 storage system for Sandra's admin account images with the following requirements:
1. Set up AWS S3 bucket configuration and permissions
2. Implement local storage fallback system
3. Create migration pipeline between local and S3 storage
4. Develop image recovery process for gallery images
5. Ensure proper error handling and logging
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Critical infrastructure task for SSELFIE Studio's image management system. This is a high-priority task that requires immediate backend implementation.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
URGENT: Create comprehensive testing suite for image storage system:
1. Test AWS S3 bucket access and permissions
2. Validate local storage functionality
3. Test migration process between storage systems
4. Verify image recovery process
5. Create testing documentation
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Quality assurance for critical image storage system implementation. Working in parallel with Zara's backend development.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Set up initial backend infrastructure for SSELFIE Studio platform, focusing on:
1. User authentication system
2. Basic API structure for the TRAIN/STYLE/SHOOT/BUILD workflow
3. Database schema for user profiles and subscription tiers (€27 Creator/€67 Entrepreneur)
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Setting up core infrastructure for SSELFIE Studio's immediate launch requirements. This is part of the initial platform establishment phase.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Develop core frontend components for SSELFIE Studio platform:
1. User dashboard interface
2. Subscription tier selection interface (Creator €27/Entrepreneur €67)
3. Basic workflow interfaces for TRAIN/STYLE/SHOOT/BUILD steps
4. Responsive design implementation
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Creating the user-facing components for SSELFIE Studio's initial launch. Focus on essential features that can be deployed immediately.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Develop core messaging and copy for SSELFIE Studio:
1. Value proposition for replacing €120-180+ monthly subscriptions
2. Clear messaging for Creator (€27) vs Entrepreneur (€67) tiers
3. Benefits comparison highlighting all-in-one platform advantages
4. Landing page copy focusing on the 5-step journey
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Creating compelling messaging for immediate market entry, emphasizing cost savings and comprehensive solution.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Implement core JWT authentication backend including:
1. User registration endpoint with email verification
2. Login endpoint with JWT token generation
3. Password reset functionality
4. Subscription tier management (Creator €27/month, Entrepreneur €67/month)
5. Token refresh mechanism
6. Secure password hashing and storage
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Building SSELFIE Studio's secure authentication system. This is the backend foundation that will support user management and subscription tiers.
expectedDeliverables: Database schema for users and subscriptions

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create frontend authentication interfaces including:
1. User registration form with email verification UI
2. Login form with proper JWT token handling
3. Password reset request and confirmation pages
4. Subscription tier selection interface
5. Account management dashboard
6. Error handling and user feedback components
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Implementing frontend components for SSELFIE Studio's authentication system. This needs to integrate with Zara's backend JWT implementation.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Perform security testing of the authentication system:
1. Test JWT token implementation for vulnerabilities
2. Verify email verification flow security
3. Test password reset functionality for exploits
4. Validate subscription tier access control
5. Check for common authentication vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10)
6. Load testing on auth endpoints
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Need comprehensive security testing of SSELFIE Studio's new authentication system to ensure it's production-ready.
